modName: Smilee - a Female Facial Expression mod
summary: put a smile on your lovely character :)
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, a combination of Female Facial Animation of nao4288 and edialog of Cotyounoyume, i choose the tender smile of Female Facial Animation and delete the stupid blush of edialog

[i]
[/i]

[u]Description[/u]
Make your cutie character smile
[u]

Requirements[/u]
SKSE ver1.5.9
Skyrim ver1.6.89

[u]Installation[/u]
use NMM to install
use MCM to configure
[i]
IT WOULD TAKE A LITTLE TIME FOR THE MODE TO INSTALL IN GAME SO WAIT A BIT, IF THE EMOTION DOESNT COME OUT, TRY TO ATTACK SOMETHING
The smile is totally dependent on your character's creation, use racemenu if you want to adjust it
[/i]Recommended HD Smile by zzjay 

[u]Credit[/u]
Female Facial Animation of [b]nao4288 and edialog of [b]Cotyounoyume
HD Smile by zzjay for tetth in screenshot 
[/b][/b]thanks nautiluse for uploading his images :)
author: ILoveYouMXR nohomo
